title: Twitter’s new “Articles” feature may let you write long-form posts
content:
Brevity is the soul of Twitter, and this is made possible due to the platform’s famous character limit. But at times, users have felt the character limit to be a hindrance, preventing them from creating long-form content on the platform. The post Twitter’s new “Articles” feature may let you write long-form posts appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Twitter is working on a new feature called Twitter Articles. The feature will reportedly allow users to write full articles on the platform.
